General.Name: Lushang Property Co Ltd
General.Description: Lushang Freda Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. develops and operates real estate properties in China. The company offers property management services, such as order maintenance, greening, public area maintenance, and other property related services. It also develops residences, commercial complexes, hospitals, schools, kindergartens, industrial parks, office buildings, and aviation related business. In addition, the company is involved in cosmetics, raw materials, and additive businesses. The company was formerly known as Lushang Health Industry Development Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to Lushang Freda Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. in April 2023. Lushang Freda Pharmaceutical Co.,Ltd. is a subsidiary of Shandong Freda Biological Co., Ltd.
